title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 2375.10 - Newsletters and press releases
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 2375.10 - Newsletters and press releases

State Regulations

The Division of Taxation may publish newsletters and furnish
the news media with press releases to make information concerning the Tax Law, related statutes and regulations adopted thereunder readily accessible to
taxpayers, tax practitioners, personnel of the division and members of the
general public. Press releases, in particular, provide a key means of alerting
such persons to important tax matters. Newsletters and press releases are
available on the department's website. Because the newsletters and press
releases of the division are exclusively of an informational character, they
have no legal force or effect, precedential value or binding
nature. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
ยง
2375.10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
